Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate how a string telephone works by showing two cups connected by a string.
The student can include details in the drawing that show how sound travels through the string.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing that the string must be pulled tight for the sound to travel effectively.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone that are used to send and receive sounds.
The student can show two people using the string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can include any challenges or solutions for making the device work better, such as how the tension of the string affects communication.
